amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that does not lower drug prices.

action.text: Amendment SA 188 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 188 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 21.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 188.
Amendment SA 188 proposed by Senator Wyden.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 188 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 21.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 188 proposed by Senator Wyden.
